professional_summary: Experienced Oracle Database Administrator with 7 years of expertise in managing and optimizing large-scale databases. Skilled in RMAN, SQL*Plus, and performance tuning. Proficient in Oracle 10g, 11g, and 12c databases. Strong background in disaster recovery and data replication using Data Guard and Streams.

key_responsibilities: Administered Oracle 11g and 12c databases across multiple environments.
Optimized database performance through regular monitoring and tuning.
Implemented backup and disaster recovery solutions using RMAN.
